headline: Broadridge Invests in DeepSee, Further Harnessing Agentic AI to Transform Post-trade Operations
summary: Building on its strategy to harness AI and harmonized data to optimize global post-trade operations, global Fintech leader Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. (NYSE: BR), today announced a strategic investment and expanded partnership with DeepSee, a leader in agentic AI technology based in Utah, U.S. The agreement includes Broadridge taking a minority ownership stake in DeepSee and marks a significant milestone in Broadridge's strategy to leverage AI and harmonized data to optimize global post-
